manifest.name: Fujifilm Grain Simulator - Official Fujifilm LUT Collection
manifest.description: Authentic Fujifilm film simulation and monochrome LUTs

luts.name: ACROS Green Filter
luts.description: ACROS monochrome with green filter for enhanced foliage and portrait tones
luts.filter_effect: Lightens green tones, darkens red tones

luts.name: ACROS Red Filter
luts.description: ACROS monochrome with red filter for dramatic skies and contrast
luts.filter_effect: Darkens blue skies, lightens red tones

luts.name: ACROS Yellow Filter
luts.description: ACROS monochrome with yellow filter for balanced contrast and skin tones
luts.filter_effect: Natural contrast enhancement, good for portraits

luts.name: ACROS
luts.description: Fujifilm's fine-grain monochrome film simulation with rich tonality

luts.name: ASTIA / Soft
luts.description: Soft and neutral color reproduction ideal for portraits

luts.name: Classic Chrome
luts.description: Vintage documentary style with muted tones and deep colors

luts.name: Classic Negative
luts.description: Classic American color negative film look with warm highlights

luts.name: ETERNA Bleach Bypass
luts.description: High-contrast cinematic look with desaturated colors and silver retention

luts.name: ETERNA Cinema
luts.description: Fujifilm's motion picture film simulation for video and cinematic stills

luts.name: MONOCHROME Green Filter
luts.description: Standard monochrome with green filter effect
luts.filter_effect: Enhances green tones for natural looking vegetation

luts.name: MONOCHROME Red Filter
luts.description: Standard monochrome with red filter for dramatic effects
luts.filter_effect: Creates dark skies and high contrast

luts.name: MONOCHROME Yellow Filter
luts.description: Standard monochrome with yellow filter for balanced results

luts.name: MONOCHROME
luts.description: Standard black and white film simulation

luts.name: Nostalgic Negative
luts.description: Vintage color negative look with amber highlights and soft shadows

luts.name: PRO Neg.Hi
luts.description: High contrast professional portrait film for studio work

luts.name: PRO Neg.Std
luts.description: Standard contrast professional portrait film with natural reproduction

luts.name: PROVIA / Standard
luts.description: Fujifilm's standard color reversal film with versatile color reproduction

luts.name: REALA ACE
luts.description: Advanced color reproduction with natural skin tones and fine grain

luts.name: VELVIA / Vivid
luts.description: High saturation and contrast for vibrant landscapes and nature

monochrome.name: Monochrome
monochrome.description: Black and white film simulations including ACROS and filter effects

color.name: Color Film
color.description: Color film simulations for various photography styles

cinematic.name: Cinematic
cinematic.description: Motion picture film simulations for video and cinematic looks

film_types.bw_filter: Black and White with color filter effect
